user_query: Retrieve the trades made on COINBASE for BTC/USDT from October 11th, 2022, to October 15th, 2022. Also, include the OHLCV metrics for the same period.

TaskList.description: Retrieve trade data for BTC/USDT from COINBASE for the specified date range.
Retrieve OHLCV metrics for BTC/USDT from COINBASE for the same date range.
